## bind_slope_data

## Description
 Bind slope chart data 


## Usage
```r
 
bind_slope_data( 
  ., 
  data = NULL, 
  id = NULL, 
  value = NULL, 
  line_thickness = NULL, 
  filter = NULL, 
  category = NULL, 
  add_to_panel_popup = NULL 
) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| data | A slope data set. |
| id | The name of the data series (eg. voting district, data mode) |
| value | Values for that data series (eg. % of votes). |
| line_thickness | Line thickness. |
| filter | Filter |
| category | Category |
| add_to_panel_popup | Makes additional columns (text, emoji, image URLs, etc) available in custom popups |
